index.title: Catalogue of X-tee Subsystems and Methods

service.dataLoadingError: Error while loading data from application server! Possible solution - please refresh your browser cache.

subsystemList.heading: Catalogue of all X-tee subsystems with methods and WSDL descriptions

intro.common:
This catalogue is generated by making meta-query 'getWsdl' and 'getOpenAPI' requests from RIA Monitoring Security Server to all X-tee subsystems.

Subsystems with the Empty icon do not have X-tee services available. Subsystems with the Error icon either could not be reached by RIA Monitoring Security Server or there was some other error during the request.

Latest version of catalogue in JSON form

Support: help@ria.ee.
intro.ieWarning: Catalogue may not work with MS Internet Explorer, please use a modern browser like Google Chrome instead.

subsystemList.moreSubsystems: Some subsystems are not available in this view due to display limit. To see more subsystems change amount of subsystems to display or filter by subsystem or service name.

subsystem.heading: Subsystem {{subsystem}} with methods and WSDL descriptions for X-tee instance "{{instance}}"
subsystem.statusWsdlError: Error while downloading or parsing of WSDL
subsystem.statusWsdlSkipped: WSDL skipped due to previous timeout
subsystem.statusOpenapiError: Error while downloading or parsing of OpenAPI
subsystem.statusOpenapiSkipped: OpenAPI skipped due to previous timeout
subsystem.statusErrorInfo: Subsystem either could not be reached by RIA Monitoring Security Server or there was some other error during the request.
subsystem.statusEmptyInfo: Subsystem does not have any methods available.
